department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: BLACKDOWN CADET TRAINING CENTRE FOOD CATERING SERVICES
description: Provide catering services for the Blackdown Cadet Training Centre.
tags: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
full_summary:
**BLACKDOWN CADET TRAINING CENTRE FOOD CATERING SERVICES**

**Services de Traiteur pour le Centre d'Instruction des Cadets Blackdown**

**Reference Number (Numéro de référence)**
WS3971388272-Doc3989759242

**Amended Document**
Document Documentary Amendment (Numéro de modification du document) : 1

**Solicitation Number (Numéro de sollicitation)**
WS3971388272

**Publication Date (Date de publication)**
05 May 2023

**Closing Date and Time (Heure de clôture)**
24 May 2023 at 14:00:00 (withdrawal of bids 2:00 PM EST)

**Ending of Contract Date (Date de fin de contrat prévue)**
31 March 2024

**Key Details**

* **Supply Category (Catégorie de fournitures)**: 90100000 - Restaurants and Catering
* **Trade Agreements (Accords commerciaux)** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (PACTE), Canadian Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* **End User Entities (Entités d'utilisation finale)**: Ministry of National Defence

* **Regions of Operation (Régions de l'opération)**: Ontario (except NCR)

* **Regions of Delivery (Régions de livraison)**: Ontario (except NCR), Canada

**Responsibilities**

* The Ministry of Public Works and Government Services (TPSGC-PWGSC) will be establishing a long-term contract for catering services for the Blackdown Cadet Training Centre.

**Key Statistics**

* **Estimated Period of Contract**: 11 months starting from 29 May 2023
* **Number of people fed**: Approximately 400 staff and regular student intake

**Deadline**

We remind potential bidders to refer to the original publication for CanadaBuys and Ariba Discovery, however a necessary amendment has to be made as of 15/05/2023. All bids submitted after 14:00 HNE on the 24th of May 2023  will be declared non-conform and will not be entertained.

To view this formal tender request please refer to the notice portion of the attached document. A detailed Contact for Notice will be provided on the link associated
